frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering at Red Hat Summit 2023
frontmatter.price: Included in your Red Hat Summit Registration
frontmatter.lead_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering is on May 23 on Eastern Standard Time (EST)
frontmatter.info_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held live in Boston, Massachusetts.As always, our focus is on creating a space for peer-to-peer interactions. This Gathering will focus on Emerging Technology and Case Studies from and by End Users with production deployments of OpenShift sharing their use cases, insights into their workloads and  lessons learned along the way. Topics covered during this Gathering include hybrid cloud infrastructure, cloud-native development, and new Emerging technology initiatives on the Edge.
frontmatter.event_footer_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held on Eastern Standard Time (EST). Please note: Attendees are required to register for Red Hat Summit. Reception is open to all registered Summit attendees and starts at 5:00 p.m.

schedule.session_name: Welcome to the Commons: Unlock the Potential of Collaboration
OpenShift Release Update and Road Map - Vanessa Martini(Red Hat)
Partner Case Study: AWS on OpenShift (ROSA)
Partner Case Study: Cloud Pak 3.0 Architecture
AMA with Red Hat Engineers, Project Leads and Guest Speakers
